Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It's not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its high-quality features and craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its exceptional benefits, I'm offering it to you for $200. This price reflects the value we place on providing top-notch products to our esteemed customers like yourself. I'm confident you'll find this investment worthwhile. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
